AI Description: MATLAB is a high-level language and interactive environment that enables you to perform computationally intensive tasks faster than with traditional programming languages such as C, C++, and Fortran. It combines computation, visualization, and programming in a simple, easy-to-use interface.
Core Features: High-Level Programming Language, Interactive Environment For Algorithm Development, Data Visualization, & Data Analysis, Extensive Library Of Mathematical Functions For Linear Algebra, Statistics, Fourier Analysis, Filtering, Optimization, & Numerical Integration.
General Tags: Computational Software, Mathematics, Applied Mathematics, Engineering & Technology
